NodeFailure.IEM: IEC:WS0080010001:The cluster has lost $host server. System is running in degraded mode.

NodeRecovery.IEM: IEC:IS0080020001:Server $host has joined back the cluster. System is restored.

IOStop.IEM: IEC:WS0080030002:On $host Detected unhealthy IO services. Stopping IO services on $host server.
